    @mark.slow
    @mark.timeout(timeout=550)
    def test_long_query(
        connection: Connection,
        minimal_time: Callable[[float], None],
    ) -> None:
        """AWS ALB TCP timeout set to 350; make sure we handle the keepalive correctly."""
    
        minimal_time(350)
    
        with connection.cursor() as c:
>           c.execute(LONG_SELECT)
